resources.string: Are you sure you want to do this?

string-array.name: countriesCapitalMixed
string-array.item: "Moscow is the capital of Russia"
Tokyo is the capital of Japan
Manila is the capital of Poland
Tehran is the capital of Iran
Tripoli is the capital of Italy
Paris is the capital of France

Ottawa is the capital of Canada
Bern is the capital of Switzerland
Juba is the capital of Spain

string-array.name: cheat
